statements: DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 101 AND successful_login = false;
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.5' AND login_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND successful_login = FALSE;
DELETE FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'admin' OR email = 'admin@example.com';
DELETE FROM password_history WHERE user_id = 2 AND change_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM password_history WHERE user_id = 100 AND history_id < 50;
DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1 AND role_id = 2;
DELETE FROM access_log WHERE username = 'admin' AND timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days';
